name: 淫内感染
summary: Akira Sakaguchi is a physician who has been appointed to a new Hospital. Rumors about his youth and skill spread fast among the nurses. One day Akira accidentally witnesses an improper behavior of his female colleague doctor after operation and can't forget that mysterious sight.
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997-09-05
  • シナリオ: GM
  • ブランド: Zyx
